about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hi, I'm Jumpei, a full-stack web developer with a background in international business and over 7 years of experience in the restaurant industry across Japan and Canada.
about.description: I enjoy building responsive, user-friendly applications with technologies like JavaScript, React, jQuery, Express, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and SCSS. My experience in diverse, fast-paced environments helps me collaborate well and build with empathy. I'm especially drawn to projects that bridge cultures and improve everyday experiences. Outside of coding, I enjoy camping🏕️ relaxing at the beach🏖️, working out🏋️‍♂️, and baseball⚾️.

contact.title: Contact
